name: St. Archew's Gage
flavorText: "Archew, the Saint of Entsteig, is remembered for his many duels with the ruffians of that city. It was said that his gauntlet lay on the street more often than on his hand." —Archibald Kerne
flavorTextHtml: "Archew, the Saint of Entsteig, is remembered for his many duels with the ruffians of that city. It was said that his gauntlet lay on the street more often than on his hand." —Archibald Kerne

secondary.textHtml: The first time an elite pack damages you, gain an absorb shield equal to 145% of your maximum Life for 10 seconds. [120 - 150]%
